header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Diets, Engagement in Family, Food deliveries, Computing, Beards, 40s Parties, Housing Shortage and School Shortages, Polish migration, Healthcare claims.
header.activity: Dinner conversation about engagement, beards and school shortages.

speaker.occupation: not currently working, caring for toddler

speaker.fls: French -- some; Hausa -- once fluent, now gone
